name: Untitled
description: The two of them use this image to advertise their adventuring services.

name: Dance
alt: Rosalia hugging Becca from behind, dancing her around.
description: When Becca gets a bit too focused in her studies, Rosalia pulls her away for a quick dance session.

name: Banner
alt: Close up of Rosalia and Becca wearing evening gowns, looking fancy for a date night.
description: This portrait was done for them at a fancy ball - they had a great time.

name: A Night Out
alt: Rosalia and Becca wearing evening gowns, looking fancy for a date night.
description: They do enjoy spending the occasional night out on the town. Being an adventurer can be lucrative.

name: Evening Snuggle
alt: Becca and Rosalia snuggling in bed.
description: Sometimes the adventures don't go well. Thankfully they have each other to confide in.

name: Relaxation
alt: Becca and Rosalia sitting on a bed of flowers, Becca's head on Rosalia's shoulders.
description: Taking a moment to stop and enjoy each others' company is important.

name: Wedding Day
alt: Rosalia and Becca on the day they got married.
description: This still remains the happiest day of their lives.

name: A Day at the Beach
alt: Rosalia and Becca in bikinis, relaxing on the beach.
description: Sometimes their adventures take them to beautiful locations. And sometimes they get distracted.
